title: MLB.com, mets.com sans serif baseball logos
content:
Could someone please help me with this font? I think it’s the same in both images, not that I know anything about font lore, but I just assumed as much seeing as they both come from MLB.com?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102185038im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mlb_logo06.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102185038im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nym_logobanner_primary.jpg)

 [‹ Luxe Bar wide techno sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102185038/http:/typophile.com/node/18887 "Go to previous forum topic") [Blackletter (Eazy-E) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102185038/http:/typophile.com/node/18898 "Go to next forum topic")
author: WhoHa

comments.content: First: they are different typefaces. mets.com is probably Helvetica.
